fields.name: title
fields.label: Featured Title
fields.description: You can edit this title for featuring purposes.

fields.label: Filename
fields.name: title
fields.description: The filename of the work. Must be unique. This is not the displayed title, just the filename.

fields.label: Info
fields.name: info
fields.description: Key info about the work. Add, remove, or re-order items. Click an item to edit. Do not include 'title' or 'link' here.

fields.label: Key
fields.name: key
fields.description: The name of the info item (appears on the left).

fields.label: Value
fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the info item (appears on the right).

fields.label: Text
fields.name: text
fields.description: The text to display for the link.

fields.label: Image Gallery
fields.name: gallery
fields.description: Images of the work. Add, remove, or re-order sections of images. Add up to 4 images per section.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of this image section.

info.value: Porcelain, High-fired colour stain, Gloop glaze, Wool
